text: Aur woh waqt jabke Allah apni taraf se gunoodgi (drowsiness) ki shakal mein tumpar itminaan o be-khaufi ki kaifiyat taari kar raha tha, aur aasman se tumhare upar pani barsa raha tha taa-ke tumhein paak karey aur tumse Shaytan ki daali hui najasat door karey aur tumhari himmat bandhaye aur iske zariye se tumhare qadam jamadey
